message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is a fair start.
I'm willing to move closer to your offer, but I need a bit more. 65-35 is my final offer before we risk losing more to inflation.
65-35 is not enough, I'll meet you at 55-45.
